titles.title: Has Thou No Scar (familiar tune nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hast thou no scar? No hidden scar On foot or side or hand? I hear thee sung Throughout the land I hear them hail thy shining star Hast thou no scar? No scar?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hast thou no wound? Yet I was wounded By the archers spent Leaned Me against A tree and rent By ravening beasts 'Round me I swooned Hast thou no wound? No wound?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}No wound? No scar? Yet as the Master Shall the servant be And pierced the feet That follow Me But whole? Can he have followed far Who has no wound No scar?{/lang-eng}
